Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer® Rapid Serum Tube Plus Blood Collection Tube
Specimen Container(s): BD Vacutainer® Rapid Serum Tube Plus Blood Collection Tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer Rapid Serum Tube Plus Blood Collection Tube for collection, separation, and processing of venous blood specimens for serum chemistry determinations.
Indications for Use Summary: Single use tube for collecting, separating, transporting and processing venous blood specimens to obtain serum for chemistry determinations for in vitro diagnostic use; not recommended for patients on heparin therapy, direct thrombin inhibitor therapy, or with Factor I deficiency.
